text: ye ambiya log jinhen khuda ne apanee neamat dee aadamee kee aulaad se hain aur unakee nasl se jinhen hamane (toofaan ke vakt) nooh ke saath (kashtee par) savaarakar liya tha aur ibaraaheem va yaakoob kee aulaad se hain aur un logon mein se hain jinakee hamane hidaayat kee aur muntikhab kiya jab unake saamane khuda kee (naazil kee huee) aayaten padhee jaatee theen to sajade mein zaaroqataar rote hue gir padate the (58) sajada
